layman_description: How long it takes to craft an item using this as an ingredient.
technical_description: Time multiplier for ingredient processing in crafting operations.
player_impact: Affects total crafting time when combining ingredients at workbenches.

layman_description: Books and manuals that unlock new crafting recipes or gameplay features when read.
technical_description: Lists unlockable content references accessible through item use.
player_impact: Progression gates new content behind finding and reading books.

layman_description: Which books you need to read before you can craft or use this item.
technical_description: Locates prerequisite unlock dependencies for item availability.
player_impact: Forces you to search for specific books before accessing advanced gear.

layman_description: Whether NPCs will buy this item from you at their shops.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling trader purchase acceptance for inventory items.
player_impact: Some items can only be sold to specific traders, not all.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you pick this item up off the ground.
technical_description: Audio event trigger for item acquisition actions.
player_impact: Provides audio feedback when looting items from bodies or containers.

layman_description: The sound effect that plays when you drop this item on the ground.
technical_description: Audio event trigger for item placement or discard actions.
player_impact: Gives audio confirmation when placing or dropping gear.

layman_description: What special ability this item has (like 'Repair', 'Melee', 'Ranged', 'Eat').
technical_description: Functional classification enum that determines ability handler type.
player_impact: Determines what actions you can perform with this item.

layman_description: Keywords describing item properties (like 'sharp', 'heavy', 'tool', 'weapon').
technical_description: CSV-delimited property tags used for dynamic stat calculations and recipe matching.
player_impact: Affects which crafting recipes accept this item and what perks apply.

layman_description: What item this creates when you use it (like a crafting recipe output).
technical_description: References target item entity created upon item consumption or activation.
player_impact: Determines what you get when using consumables or completing recipes.

layman_description: How many of the created item you get from using this once.
technical_description: Quantity multiplier for item creation operations.
player_impact: Tells you how efficient a recipe or consumable is.

layman_description: What damaged version of this block appears as you break it down.
technical_description: References next destructible state in multi-stage degradation sequence.
player_impact: Determines visual progression as you damage and destroy blocks.

layman_description: What items can randomly spawn inside this container or block.
technical_description: References loot pool definition for item spawning on block destruction.
player_impact: Determines what treasure you might find inside containers and defeated enemies.

layman_description: Special rules for how this block must be placed (like on walls or doors).
technical_description: Placement behavior enum defining orientation and attachment requirements.
player_impact: Some blocks only work when placed in specific ways or locations.

layman_description: How much total damage this block can take before breaking completely.
technical_description: Maximum hitpoint value for block destruction state machine.
player_impact: Determines how many hits or how long it takes to break this block.

layman_description: How damaged this block starts when placed (useful for ruins and decayed structures).
technical_description: Initial damage value for freshly placed block instances.
player_impact: Pre-damaged blocks look more worn and degrade faster.

layman_description: How long you must wait between using this item again (like gun fire rate).
technical_description: Time interval enforcing action cooldown between consecutive uses.
player_impact: Affects your attack or action speed with this item.

layman_description: How much fuel this item provides when burned in furnaces or torches.
technical_description: Energy value for combustion-based crafting operations.
player_impact: Determines how long this fuel item keeps furnaces and lights burning.

layman_description: Whether this item breaks permanently when it runs out of durability.
technical_description: Boolean flag for item durability system termination behavior.
player_impact: Some items become worthless when broken, others can be repaired forever.

layman_description: Whether this weapon can hit with reduced damage on glancing blows.
technical_description: Enables directional damage mitigation for angled attack impacts.
player_impact: Makes weapon combat more skill-based with directional hit feedback.

layman_description: The angle your character swings this melee weapon through.
technical_description: Rotation range for first-person swing animation and hit detection.
player_impact: Wider swings hit more enemies but are slower.
